Few more weeks until $link mainnet then?
Watch @chainlink CEO @SergeyNazarov being interviewed by @twobitidiot on the future of #Chainlink at #ETHDenver.    https://t.co/TDW784emlR

.@SergeyNazarov CEO @chainlink's panel comments during #ETHDenver were some of the most insightful we've seen yet regarding the #SmartContract "oracle problem".    Truly deterministic data must come from many different sources. No single point of trust should be established.  https://t.co/aDr03Qajr5

This really sums up the huge value proposition:  Chainlink could be the Amazon of oracles. Sure you can sell your oracle service off your own website, but you'd be stupid not to also sell it on the world's largest marketplace for oracles. Your reputaiton on it will be everything.

If you think the peak of smart contracts is tokenization and ICOs then you probably thought the peak of the Internet was email. The truth is that the biggest use cases haven't even begun. Chainlink will open up Pandora's box by giving them connectivity to the real world.

One thing I found interesting coming out of #ETHDenver was a possibility that other oracle providers will end up ceding to Chainlink and begin to build their systems into Chainlink or/and decentralized oracle specialized entrepreneurs.

Oraclize at #ETHDenver! Our CEO @ThomasBertani has been moderating the "oracles and data-driven dapps" yesterday. Panelists included @streamr, @RhombusNetwork, @MakerDAO and @chainlink. Watch out for oracles - a key component for most dapps, we are here to stay!  https://t.co/j2uqoeKZCJ

I love that ChainLink doesn’t have an official roadmap. Much of crypto has been tainted with the idea of needing tasks performed by a certain date to validate price. $LINK is methodical in every move they make. Where Link is going, no roads are needed.  https://t.co/ca6BgqDWVL

Every oracle service should have a presence on #Chainlink's decentralized oracle network as it becomes the default connecting piece of #smartcontracts to real world data. Building up reputation as being a reliable oracle will be just as important as actually delivering good data.

🚨SPOILER ALERT 🚨#EthCC will have an entire track dedicated to the @web3foundation and they are treating us with talks from @ethstatus @ChainSafeth @protocollabs @chainlink  and many others ! Spoil us @web3jp   only at  https://t.co/Ru270olRXW

We are still so early, it's very exciting! $link is still in cruise control and flying under the radar. I'd say 90% of the people I know in crypto, still haven't heard of it. Eventually, #chainlink will have a fomo-run that will make people's faces melt. I'm prepared, are you?

Finally calling it a night 😴 #ETHDenver   I got to try out #Zepkit and the #openzeppelin library ✔️  Simply easy @portis_io user onboarding integration ✔️  @projectopensea API for retrieving NFT metadata and a customizable marketplace ✔️  @chainlink Oracle for real world verif✔️
